articles.title: Ukraine Claims Progress In Recapturing Towns As Counteroffensive In Kherson Continues - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy’s office said 88 settlements in the southern Kherson region and 551 settlements in the northeastern Kharkiv region have been “de-occupied,” while the Ukrainian forces' counteroffensive in the Kherson region moves ahead.
